name: Land Tenure Shapes Black Bear Density and Abundance on a Multi-Use Landscape
description: Data for resource selection function (RSF) and spatially explicit capture recapture (SECR) analyses completed for the manuscript titled "Land Tenure Shapes Black Bear Density and Abundance on a Multi-Use Landscape" published in Ecology and Evolution. For any and all data usages, please cite: Loosen AE, Morehouse AT, Boyce MS. Land tenure shapes black bear density and abundance on a multi‐use landscape. Ecol Evol. 2018;00:1–17. https://doi.org/10.1002/ece3.4617

citation.text: Loosen AE, Morehouse AT, Boyce MS. Land tenure shapes black bear density and abundance on a multi‐use landscape. Ecol Evol. 2018;00:1–17. https://doi.org/10.1002/ece3.4617

distribution.name: Female_RSF.tab
distribution.description: Data for female black bear resource selection function (RSF) analyses for the manuscript titled "Land Tenure Shapes Black Bear Density and Abundance on a Multi-Use Landscape".

distribution.name: Female_SECR_2013.tab
distribution.description: Data for 2013 female spatially explicit capture recapture (SECR) analyses for the manuscript titled "Land Tenure Shapes Black Bear Density and Abundance on a Multi-Use Landscape".

distribution.description: Data for 2014 female spatially explicit capture recapture (SECR) analyses for the manuscript titled "Land Tenure Shapes Black Bear Density and Abundance on a Multi-Use Landscape".

distribution.description: Data for male black bear resource selection function (RSF) analyses for the manuscript titled "Land Tenure Shapes Black Bear Density and Abundance on a Multi-Use Landscape".

distribution.description: Data for 2013 male spatially explicit capture recapture (SECR) analyses for the manuscript titled "Land Tenure Shapes Black Bear Density and Abundance on a Multi-Use Landscape".
